long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Irish driving test time finder | RSA Test Finder | myroadsafety extension

Get a driving test in two days!! RSA Test Finder is an automated tool designed to help you find available driving test slots effortlessly. With real-time updates and email notifications, you can secure your driving test appointment without constantly checking the RSA website.

DO NOT JOIN THE WAITLIST

Key Features
Automated Test Availability Checks: RSA Test Finder automatically checks for driving test slot availability every 30 seconds, so you don't have to.

Email Notifications: Get instant email notifications when a test slot becomes available. Simply enter your notification email, and RSA Test Finder will alert you.

Easy-to-Use Interface: The intuitive interface allows you to set up and start your search with just a few clicks.

Customisable Notification Email: Easily customise the email address where you want to receive notifications.
How to Use

Install the Extension: Add RSA Test Finder to your Chrome browser.

Open the RSA Website: Navigate to the RSA driving test booking website.

Login to myroadsafety.rsa.ie: Login and navigate to "Book a driving test" page. DO NOT JOIN THE WAITLIST

Activate the Extension: Click on the RSA Test Finder icon in the Chrome toolbar to open the popup.

Save Your Email: Enter your notification email in the provided field and click 'Save Email'. You will receive a confirmation message.

Start the Search: Click 'Start Search' to begin checking for available test slots.

Receive Notifications: When a test slot is found, you will receive an email notification with the details. The available slots will also be displayed on the extension popup.
Benefits

Save Time: Avoid the hassle of manually checking for test slots multiple times a day.

Be First to Know: Get notified as soon as a slot becomes available, giving you the best chance to book it before others.

Simple and Effective: With its user-friendly design, RSA Test Finder makes the process of finding a driving test slot stress-free.

Privacy and Permissions
Your privacy is important to us. RSA Test Finder only requests necessary permissions to check for test slot availability and send email notifications. We do not store or misuse your data.

Support
If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact our support team at support@rsaaway.com. We are here to help you.

Install RSA Test Finder today and take the stress out of finding a driving test slot. Happy driving!
